home_preferences.ideal_family: Caring homes that can offer plenty of time, play, and companionship
home_preferences.ideal_environment: Hybrid (mostly indoor but with safe ways to explore the 'great outdoors')
outdoor_options: Enclosed patios, catios, or fenced yards
Supervised yard time or leash/harness walks
GPS or smart collars (Tractive GPS Tracker for Cats / Dogs, Whistle Go Explore, Pawfit 3, etc.)
safety_notes: Sensible balance of safety, companionship, and healthy sense of adventure are our top priorities.

policies.not_breeders_note: Family cat’s litter—we’re just rehoming responsibly.

contact.preface: Tell us about your home, other pets, and experience with pets.
